TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit StaticParameterBinder extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Runs the PowerShell parameter binding algorithm against a CommandAst, returning information about which parameters were bound.

Docs.param: The CommandAst that represents the command invocation.
Docs.summary: Bind a CommandAst to one of PowerShell's built-in commands
Docs.returns: The StaticBindingResult that represents the binding.

Docs.param: The CommandAst that represents the command invocation.
Boolean to determine whether binding should be syntactic, or should attempt to resolve against an existing command.
Docs.summary: Bind a CommandAst to the specified command
Docs.returns: The StaticBindingResult that represents the binding.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Management.Automation.Language.StaticBindingResult BindCommand (System.Management.Automation.Language.CommandAst commandAst, bool resolve, string[] desiredParameters);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Management.Automation.Language.StaticBindingResult BindCommand(class System.Management.Automation.Language.CommandAst commandAst, bool resolve, string[] desiredParameters) cil managed

Docs.param: The CommandAst that represents the command invocation.
Boolean to determine whether binding should be syntactic, or should attempt to resolve against an existing command.
A string array that represents parameter names of interest. If any of these are specified, then full binding is done.
Docs.summary: Bind a CommandAst to the specified command
Docs.returns: The StaticBindingResult that represents the binding.
